subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk and Zach Parise have well-earned reputations for being scorers, and their setup guy is the heady and fundamentally sound center Travis Zajac.
snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk and Zach Parise have well-earned reputations for being scorers, and their setup guy is the heady and fundamentally sound center Travis Zajac.
